Acceptance criteria:

- BM25 search returns keyword-matching chunks

title: Phase 3 Gate Testing
description:
Phase 3 Gate Testing - Verify all retrieval and generation components work correctly.

Test Requirements:

1. Hybrid Search Testing:
   - Test vector search returns semantically similar chunks
   - Test BM25 search returns keyword-matching chunks
   - Verify RRF combines both effectively
   - Confirm top_k=50 retrieval works

2. Reranker Testing:
   - Verify reranker filters 50 → 5 chunks
   - Check top chunks show improved relevance
   - Test error handling for API failures
   - Log reranking performance

3. LLM Integration Testing:
   - Test OpenRouter connection
   - Verify Claude 3.5 / GPT-4o model selection
   - Confirm prompt template works
   - Check answer generation from context

4. End-to-End Query Testing:
   - Test QueryEngine orchestration
   - Verify streaming responses
   - Check citation formatting
   - Test error handling

5. Manual Quality Tests (5 questions):
   - Question 1: Factual retrieval (specific fact)
   - Question 2: Concept explanation (broad topic)
   - Question 3: Comparison (multiple documents)
   - Question 4: Technical detail (specific method)
   - Question 5: Edge case (ambiguous query)

Files to create:
- tests/test_phase3_gate.py

Acceptance criteria:
- All automated tests pass
- Manual quality tests pass (4/5+ acceptable)
- Citations are accurate and formatted
- LLM answers are relevant and sourced
- No critical errors in pipeline
- Performance meets requirements (rerank <2s, LLM <10s)

Dependencies:
- Requires all Phase 3 implementation tasks complete
